001package tictactoe;
002
003/**
004 * Contains four different directions:
005 * Vertical, horizontal, diagonal and reverse diagonal
006 * 
007 * @author Tapio Malmberg
008 */
009class Directions {
010    /**
011     * Vertical direction: x value is increased.
012     */
013    public static final Direction VERTICAL = new Direction(1, 0);
014
015    /**
016     * Horizontal direction: y value is increased.
017     */
018    public static final Direction HORIZONTAL = new Direction(0, 1);
019
020    /**
021     * Diagonal direction: x and y values are increased (from upper left to lower right).
022     */
023    public static final Direction DIAGONAL = new Direction(1, 1);
024
025    /**
026     * Reverse diagonal direction: x is increased, y is decreased (from lower left to upper right).
027     */
028    public static final Direction REVERSE_DIAGONAL = new Direction(1, -1);
029
030    /**
031     * An array that contains all the four directions.
032     */
033    public static final Direction[] ALL = { VERTICAL, HORIZONTAL, DIAGONAL, REVERSE_DIAGONAL };
034}
